title: Roquefort, Serrano ham and pear salad

ingredients.item: 2 Waitrose Perfectly Ripe Pears, peeled, cored and sliced

instructions.step: Toss the pear slices with half the lemon juice. Arrange the salad on four serving plates. On top, scatter the pear slices, slices of ham and the Roquefort.  Whisk together the remaining lemon juice, olive oil, yogurt and seasoning. Drizzle over the salad and scatter with the pomegranate seeds. Serve.
